tool_description: An AI service from Microsoft Azure that enables secure, ad-free location search for your users, displaying relevant information from web results, images, local businesses, news and images Photo.
title: Bing Search APIs

api_list.name: Web Search API
api_list.description: Search data and suggested keywords from Bing search engine.

api_list.name: Images Search
api_list.description: Search images from the search engine for the most relevant keywords and images related to keywords and images.

api_list.name: Emails Search
api_list.description: Search emails from search engines for related keywords.
